alert.note: Alert for Attala; Choctaw; Holmes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 12:17AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Choctaw, southeastern Holmes, northwestern Noxubee, southwestern Oktibbeha, Attala and Winston Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1217 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Craig Springs to 11 miles northeast of Kosciusko to near Lexington. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Craig Springs around 1230 AM CDT. Betheden around 1235 AM CDT. Newport and Mcadams around 1250 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Ethel, Sallis, French Camp, West, Mccool, Sturgis and Weir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Choctaw; Holmes; Noxubee; Oktibbeha; Winston
